name: Starguy IV
description:
ARE YOU A BAD ENOUGH DUDE to blast your way through 9 STAGES OF PROCEDURALLY GENERATED, TURN-BASED ACTION? PROBABLY NOT!

STARGUY IV is a roguelike created in 7 days for 7DRL 2021.

Travel through 3 STRANGE WORLDS battling 20 UNIQUE ENEMIES - but you'll need all the help you can get with a variety of GUNS, SKILLS, and PASSIVES.

CONTROLS:

  • Arrow keys - move
  • Z - fire
  • X - swap weapon
  • Q - pick up weapon
  • A - use skill 1
  • S - use skill 2

CREDITS:

  • sarn - Programming
  • valentines - Art
  • Mista Jub - Audio

GET THE SOUNDTRACK HERE
